name: BatSounds
0:
”Alexa open Bat Sounds”
”Alexa ask Bat Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bat sounds
des:
This skill immerses you in the captivating world of the night as experienced through the ears of nature. Listen to the unique and intriguing sounds of bats using echolocation or simply socializing among themselves. It's perfect for adding an atmospheric touch to your evening or for educational purposes to learn more about these nocturnal creatures.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Bat Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
